Title: Wingmen
Plot: When Grandad's oldest friend, and possibly his worst friend, Moe, dies, the Freemans go back home and Grandad wants the possession Moe left him. Meanwhile, Huey is eager to see his friend again but both Grandad and Huey both discover to put the past behind them and focus on the future.
GuestStars: Mike Epps, Dee Bradley Baker, Ch? Bouey, Affion Crockett, Niecy Nash, DJ Pooh, Kevin Michael Richardson, Kym Whitley, Austin Williams
